title: Group portrait of Braves Little League baseball team, from left, kneeling: William Abramonitz, Ronald Wright, Reginald Bennett, Roderick Horne, James Montgomery, Curtiss McGee, and Carl Morris; second row: Rickey Moloney, Donald Alexander, Charles Butler, Tyland Richardson, Craig Clark, Montell Brundage, Amos Lawson, Fred Hill, and George Morris; rear: coach Elbert Montgomery, and manager Joseph Geller, posed possibly on Ammon Field, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
